message.body: Hey This is the guy who was emailing u..my name is marquis .. And what's the cheapest price u would do for a music video ?
I think its easier for u to tell me what u wanna spend. Im lookin for 250 but i can work around ur budget
We can work with that. What r u lookin to do? U in philly area?
Yea I'm in the Philly area... Basically the song would be nothing major just get a couple shots of different scenes with me and my friend rapping
Yeah thats def doable. U wanna meet up and talk about it? When u looking to get started? In in center city
